title: Questioning Childhood Trauma (feat. Joe DeRosa, Shane Gillis & Big Jay's Mom)
description: One of the most traumatic childhood events of young Jay’s life finally gets closure when his mom calls in to reveal the truth about “The Jamaica Incident." Jay, Dan, Joe DeRosa and guest Shane Gillis are floored by a comedy trailer that leads to a discussion about “’the art of improv.“ The hosts share how quarantine has certainly affected their sex lives.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
